text: hey I've been out of the loop for a while - any updates on the ledger couchdb front ?

We have made good progress with CouchDB.  <https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FAB-959> (merged) gave us the ability to run end-to-end transactions through CouchDB from the peer. And <https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FAB-827> (changeset in gerrit) adds a config option in core.yaml to switch from default embedded LevelDB to CouchDB.  I will provide a demo of these functions at week end.
<@U1CTBUNEN> how is the query API to expose _find going? Do you want to put something in gerrit for review?
Also, <https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FAB-788> (merged) has switched the default DB from RocksDB to goleveldb (LevelDB ported to go)
I'm trying to get back into it
but I also realized that I need to sit down and spend some time learning the core codebase first
